answers.answer: I JUST got diagnosed today with the same thing. I'm 32+2 and the goal is to get me to 37 weeks as well. I have 2 visits, ultrasound, and lab work every week.
How do you get preeclampsia im going to my doctors appointment tomorrow for it what causes it?

Pre Eclampsia is when your body is not absorbing enough nutrients for both you and baby, so baby is taking all of it and leaving your body llacking. Which makes your liver and kidneys work harder to produce blood. Which is why high BP is an indicator as well as protein in the urine. Not all women get it and it doesn't always happen with every pregnancy.
I was about to reply to my other post then realized you are the same person. ^_^ lol
Ohhh ok make sense thank you lol i feel so slow
Lol i was so curious cause my doctor had me do it for my second pregnancy i didn't do it with my first
No problem! My mom's mid wife helped fill me in on it.

I had it at 35 weeks with my first pregnancy. My blood pressure was high and i had to be induced. Everything went ok. I have a healthy 2 year old boy and i'm 20 weeks pregnant with a baby girl. Good luck :)
How does it feel to have high blood pressure
The symptoms to look for is seeing spots or floaties, headache that won't go away with Tylenol, or black outs. Sometimes it's just hard to tell.
Like I never felt like I had high BP. But my Pre E isn't in the "severe" zone yet. My dr said aby BP 160/105 is considered severe.

question: Hi mommies/mommies to be! I was in the doctor last week and my blood pressure was high and I had protein in my urine. I am now on weekly visits and my doctor is talking about having to induce me at 37 weeks. I am currently 32 weeks and 5 days. Wondering how many of you mommies had to go through this and what was your outcome?
title: Mommies with Preeclampsia
